personal_info.summary: Electronic and Telecommunications Engineer with expertise in software development and data analysis, experienced in the aerospace education field and currently focused on Python programming for computer vision and data analysis.

responsibilities: Designed and implemented software and hardware solutions in Python for data analysis and active target detection using computer vision.
Developed a functional model of an interactive satellite with operational sensors and payload, remotely controlled via wireless communication.
Implemented Python algorithms for the development and deployment of biomedical simulators, integrating signal processing modules and hardware control using sensors and actuators.
Developed a Python application for data integration into AWS S3 by implementing Buckets, utilizing efficient memory management techniques to optimize data collection in cloud environments.
Developed business intelligence models using Qlik Sense for data analysis and provided support for ETL processes in Python, as well as generating SQL queries from OneDrive documents.
Provided technical support for information updates, optimizing processes through local data analysis and in Azure or AWS cloud environments for visualization in Power BI.

work_experience.company: Centro de Investigacion y Desarrollo en Tecnología Aeroespacial FAC
responsibilities: Applied European Space Agency methodologies to optimize the design and configuration of the FACSAT-3A engineering model, performing power calculations and channel allocation.
Collected, analyzed, and organized information to facilitate the assembly of a parabolic antenna in Antarctic territory based on an existing construction manual.
Programmed and designed the Python code for the engineering satellite model for a Ministry of Defense exhibition, ensuring functionality at both hardware and software levels.
Designed telemetry and remote ignition systems for a non-guided sounding rocket, programmed in C++, to monitor meteorological variables for scientific purposes.
Designed electronic solutions at the software and hardware levels for remotely operated robotic structures, programmed in C++ through a microcontroller.
Developed motorized systems with automated sequences to simulate industrial process optimization, with Python applications enabling access to their functions.
